prompts: Create a cute aquatic Pokemon with a bubbly personality and round features.
Imagine a playful blue creature that loves to swim and play in the water.
Design a small, charming Pokemon that has a round body and a mischievous grin.
Show me a water-type Pokemon that has a vibrant blue color and a fluffy tail.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a tiny mouse and enjoys playing in grassy fields.
Make a friendly creature that looks like a blue ball with big ears and a happy expression.
Give me an adorable Pokemon that loves to splash around and is often found near water.
